file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 53-21-03-04 - MAIN-DOOR FRAME STOP AND HANDRAIL SUPPORT - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL MAIN-DOOR FRAME STOP AND HANDRAIL SUPPORT - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to remove and install the Main-Door Frame Stop and Handrail Support. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY MAIN-DOOR FRAME STOP AND HAND- ALL 53-21-03-000-801-A RAIL SUPPORT - REMOVAL MAIN-DOOR FRAME STOP AND HAND- ALL 53-21-03-400-801-A RAIL SUPPORT - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 53-21-03 Page 1 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 53-21-03-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. MAIN-DOOR FRAME STOP AND HANDRAIL SUPPORT - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the instructions to remove the Main-Door Frame Stop and Handrail Support. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM SDS 52-10-00/1 AMM SDS 52-18-00/1 AMM TASK 25-21-02-000-801-A/400 FLIGHT ATTENDANT SEAT - REMOVAL AMM TASK 25-22-01-000-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-26-03-000-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-26-04-000-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-26-04-000-803-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-26-04-000-804-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-27-04-000-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-30-07-000-801-A/400 - TASK 25-26-04-000-802-A - TASK 25-26-04-000-805-A - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Left center fuselage I EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 53-21-03 Page 2 of 7 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-003-A (1) Open the airstairs main door (AMM SDS 52-10-00/1) or the side-hinged main door (AMM SDS 52-18-00/1). (2) Remove the flight attendant seat ( AMM TASK 25-21-02-000-801-A/400) or windscreen (AMM TASK 25-27-04-000-801-A/400) or emergency-equipment stowage unit (AMM TASK 25-26-03-000-801-A/400) or LH wardrobe (AMM TASK 25-26-04-000-801-A/400) or (TASK 25-26-04-000-802-A) or (AMM TASK 25-26-04-000-803-A/400) or (AMM TASK 25-26-04-000-804-A/400) or (TASK 25-26-04-000-805-A) or LH galley (AMM TASK 25-30-07-000-801-A/400) or LH PSU- Structure Module I (AMM TASK 25-22-01-000-801-A/400), as applicable. J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-003-A (1) Remove the screws (1) and (2), nuts (4) and (5), and washers (3) and (6) from the handrail support. Discard the nuts. NOTE: Screws are different in size. Write down their positions. (2) Remove the handrail support. (3) Remove the screws (7) and (8), nuts (10) and (11), and washers (9) and (12) from the stop. Discard the nuts. NOTE: Screws are different in size. Write down their positions. (4) Remove the stop. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 53-21-03 Page 3 of 7 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 53-21-03-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. MAIN-DOOR FRAME STOP AND HANDRAIL SUPPORT - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the instructions to install the Main-Door Frame Stop and Handrail Support. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM SDS 52-10-00/1 AMM SDS 52-18-00/1 AMM TASK 25-21-02-400-801-A/400 FLIGHT ATTENDANT SEAT - INSTALLATION AMM TASK 25-26-03-400-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-26-04-400-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-26-04-400-803-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-26-04-400-804-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-27-04-400-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-30-07-400-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 52-10-01-820-809-A/500 MAIN DOOR STOPS - ADJUSTMENT AMM TASK 52-18-00-820-808-A/500 MAIN DOOR STOPS - ADJUSTMENT IPC 53-21-00 CENTRAL I SRM 51-20-01/1 - TASK 25-22-01-420-001-A - TASK 25-26-04-400-802-A - TASK 25-26-04-400-805-A - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL G. Expendable Parts IPC REFERENCE ITEM QTY (VENDOR REFERENCE) Nut IPC 53-21-00 80 H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Left center fuselage I I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 400-003-A WARNING: BE CAREFUL WHEN YOU USE THE METHYL-ETHYL-KETONE (MEK). PUT ON SAFETY GOGGLES, PROTECTIVE GLOVES AND CLOTHING. DO NOT BREATHE THE GAS. DO THE WORK IN AN AREA WHICH HAS A GOOD FLOW OF AIR. THE METHYL-ETHYL-KETONE (MEK) IS POISONOUS AND HIGHLY FLAMMABLE. (1) Clean the stop, handrail support and the installation area with Methyl-ethyl-ketone. (2) Apply interface sealant PS870 C-12 (SRM 51-20-01/1) to the faying surfaces of the stop, handrail support and the fuselage installation area. Seal the nut holes to prevent damage to the electrical bonding area caused by the sealant (Figure 401). (3) Install the screws (1) and (2), nuts (4) and (5), and washers (3) and (6) to attach the handrail support. NOTE: Screws are different in size. Make sure that they are installed in the correct positions. (4) Install the screws (7) and (8), nuts (10) and (11), and washers (9) and (12) to attach the stop. NOTE: Screws are different in size. Make sure that they are installed in the correct positions. (5) Remove the excess protective coat. J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-003-A (1) Adjust the airstairs door stop ( AMM TASK 52-10-01-820-809-A/500) or side-hinged door stop (AMM TASK 52-18-00-820-808-A/500). (2) Install the flight attendant seat ( AMM TASK 25-21-02-400-801-A/400) or windscreen (AMM TASK 25-27-04-400-801-A/400) or emergency-equipment stowage unit (AMM TASK 25-26-03-400-801-A/400) or LH wardrobe (AMM TASK 25-26-04-400-801-A/ 400) or (TASK 25-26-04-400-802-A) or (AMM TASK 25-26-04-400-803-A/400) or (AMM TASK 25-26-04-400-804-A/400) or (TASK 25-26-04-400-805-A) or LH galley (AMM TASK 25-30-07-400-801-A/400) or LH PSU-Structure Module I (TASK 25-22-01-420-001-A), as applicable. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 53-21-03 Page 6 of 7 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (3) Close the airstairs main door (AMM SDS 52-10-00/1) or side-hinged main door (AMM SDS 52-18-00/1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 53-21-03 Page 7 of 7 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
